search.query: | inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_INCIDENTS.csv | eval time=strptime(sys_created_on, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") , last_3_months=relative_time(now(), "-2mon@mon") | where time>last_3_months
| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_CHANGE_REQUESTS.csv | eval time=strptime(sys_created_on, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") , last_3_months=relative_time(now(), "-2mon@mon") | where time>last_3_months
| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_PROBLEMS.csv | eval time=strptime(sys_created_on, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") , last_3_months=relative_time(now(), "-2mon@mon") | where time>last_3_months

input.label: Creation Date Picker

search.query: | makeresults | eval mon=mvrange(1, 5) | mvexpand mon | eval mon=mon-1 | eval month=if(mon>0,(0-mon)."mon","") | eval earliest1=if(mon>0,"-".mon."mon@mon","@mon") | eval _time=relative_time(_time,month."@mon") | eval current_year=strftime(now(),"%Y") , year=strftime(_time,"%Y") | where year=current_year | eval current_month=strftime(now(),"%B %Y"), current_month_ptime=strftime(now(),"%Y%m") | eval month=strftime(_time,"%B %Y"), month_ptime=strftime(_time,"%Y%m") | streamstats current=f last(earliest1) as latest1 | eval earliest1=if(mon>2,"-2mon@mon",earliest1) , latest1=if(mon>2,"now",latest1) | fillnull value="now" latest1 | eval option=case(current_month=month, "Current Month ".month , mon>2, "For ALL last 3 months", current_month_ptime>month_ptime ,"For ".month , true(),false) | eval month=if(mon>2,"last 3 months",month) | dedup option | eval value_time=earliest1." | ".latest1." | ".month." | ".option | eval mon_range=case(mon=3,1, mon=0,2,mon=1,3,mon=2,4, true(),false) | sort mon_range | fields - mon_range

input.default: -2mon@mon | now | last 3 months | For ALL last 3 months

search.query: | inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_PROBLEMS.csv | append [| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_INCIDENTS.csv] | append [| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_CHANGE_REQUESTS.csv] | dedup it_solution | table it_solution

input.label: Service Offering
input.search: ch| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_PROBLEMS.csv | append [| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_INCIDENTS.csv] | append [| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_CHANGE_REQUESTS.csv] | dedup so | table so $tok_earliest$ $tok_latest$

search.query: | inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_PROBLEMS.csv | append [| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_INCIDENTS.csv] | append [| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_CHANGE_REQUESTS.csv] | dedup NEW_CI | table NEW_CI | sort NEW_CI
| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_INCIDENTS.csv | dedup iris_code | table iris_code | sort 0 iris_code
| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_INCIDENTS.csv | dedup sys_created_by_tool | table sys_created_by_tool | sort 0 sys_created_by_tool

chart.title: The Count Of Incidents By Status Per Month

search.query:
| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_inc$" AND iris_code="$iris_code$" AND sys_created_by_tool="$sys_created_by_tool$" AND priority="$priority$" | eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
| eval late=case(like(late,"%now%"),now(),true(),relative_time(now(), late)) , earl=relative_time(now(),earl) | where time<=late AND time>=earl
| convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" mktime(sys_created_on) as _time | timechart cont=false span=$1mon$ count(number) as count_number by status useother=f limit=0 | addtotals

chart.title: The Count Of Incidents By Status Per Week

search.query:
| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_inc$" AND iris_code="$iris_code$" AND sys_created_by_tool="$sys_created_by_tool$" AND priority="$priority$" | eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
| eval late=case(like(late,"%now%"),now(),true(),relative_time(now(), late)) , earl=relative_time(now(),earl) | where time<=late AND time>=earl
| convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" mktime(sys_created_on) as _time | timechart cont=false span=$1w@w1$ count(number) as count_number by status useother=f limit=0 | addtotals

chart.title: The Count Of Incidents By Status Per Day

search.query:
| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_inc$" AND iris_code="$iris_code$" AND sys_created_by_tool="$sys_created_by_tool$" AND priority="$priority$" | eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
| eval late=case(like(late,"%now%"),now(),true(),relative_time(now(), late)) , earl=relative_time(now(),earl) | where time<=late AND time>=earl
| convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" mktime(sys_created_on) as _time | timechart cont=false span=$1d$ count(number) as count_number by status useother=f limit=0 | addtotals

viz.title: The Count Of Incidents by Tool/Other User [Manually]

search.query:
| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_inc$" AND iris_code="$iris_code$" AND sys_created_by_tool="$sys_created_by_tool$" AND priority="$priority$" | eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
| eval late=case(like(late,"%now%"),now(),true(),relative_time(now(), late)) , earl=relative_time(now(),earl) | where time<=late AND time>=earl | stats dc(number) as "Count Of Incidents" by sys_created_by_tool

viz.title: The Count Of Incidents By IrisCode

search.query:
| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_inc$" AND iris_code="$iris_code$" AND sys_created_by_tool="$sys_created_by_tool$" AND priority="$priority$" | eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
| eval late=case(like(late,"%now%"),now(),true(),relative_time(now(), late)) , earl=relative_time(now(),earl) | where time<=late AND time>=earl
| stats dc(number) as Incidents_Count by iris_code

viz.title: The Count Of Incidents By Priority

search.query:
| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_inc$" AND iris_code="$iris_code$" AND sys_created_by_tool="$sys_created_by_tool$" AND priority="$priority$"
| eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
| eval late=case(like(late,"%now%"),now(),true(),relative_time(now(), late)) , earl=relative_time(now(),earl) | where time<=late AND time>=earl
| append[| makeresults | eval priority="1;2;3;4;5" | fields - _time | mvexpand priority | makemv priority delim=";" | mvexpand priority] | stats count by priority | eval count=count-1 | addtotals col=t labelfield=priority fieldname=count | eval color=case(priority="1" , "#DC4E41" , priority="2" , "#FCCE54" , priority="3" ,"#A267D8" , priority="4" ,"#ACA49E" , priority="5" ,"#6C757D", priority="Total","#87C1FF", true(),false ), priority=case(priority="1" , "P 1" , priority="2" , "P 2" , priority="3" ,"P 3" , priority="4" ,"P 4" , priority="5" ,"P 5", priority="Total","Total", true(), false )

viz.title: The Count Of Incidents By Status

search.query:
| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_inc$" AND iris_code="$iris_code$" AND sys_created_by_tool="$sys_created_by_tool$" AND priority="$priority$" | eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
| eval late=case(like(late,"%now%"),now(),true(),relative_time(now(), late)) , earl=relative_time(now(),earl) | where time<=late AND time>=earl
| append [ | makeresults | eval status="New;Pending;Resolved;Closed;In Progress" | fields - _time | mvexpand status | makemv status delim=";" | mvexpand status] | stats count by status | eval count=count-1 | addtotals col=t labelfield=status fieldname=count | eval color=case(status="In Progress" , "#F1813F" , status="New" , "#DC4E41" , status="Pending" , "#708794" , status="Resolved" , "#3ff181" , status="Closed" , "#35882B", status="Total","#87C1FF", true(),false )

viz.title: The Count Of Incidents By Current Assignment Group

search.query:
| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_inc$" AND iris_code="$iris_code$" AND sys_created_by_tool="$sys_created_by_tool$" AND priority="$priority$" | eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
| eval late=case(like(late,"%now%"),now(),true(),relative_time(now(), late)) , earl=relative_time(now(),earl) | where time<=late AND time>=earl | stats dc(number) as Incidents by assignment_group_name

table.title: $count$ Incidents

search.query:
| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_inc$" AND sys_created_by_tool="$sys_created_by_tool$" AND iris_code="$iris_code$" AND priority="$priority$" | eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
| eval late=case(like(late,"%now%"),now(),true(),relative_time(now(), late)) , earl=relative_time(now(),earl) | where time<=late AND time>=earl | eval sys_created_on=strftime(time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| table number,it_solution,so,NEW_CI,opened_at,sys_created_on,sys_updated_on,resolved_at,closed_at,short_description,assignment_group_name,sys_id,priority,status,sys_created_by,sys_created_by_tool,iris_code
| rename number as "Incident Number",sys_created_on as "Created on (CET)",sys_updated_on as "Modification Time (CET)",sys_created_by as "Created By",short_description as "Short Description", status as Status, priority as Priority, so as "Service Offering" , resolved_at as "Resolved At (CET)" , NEW_CI as CI , it_solution as "IT Solution", assignment_group_name as "Current Assignment Group", active as Active, approval as Approval,closed_at as "Closed At (CET)",opened_at as "Opened At (CET)",urgency as Urgency,iris_code as "IRIS Code",sys_created_by_tool as "Created By Tool"

table.fields: ["Incident Number","IT Solution","Service Offering","CI","Opened At (CET)","Created on (CET)","Modification Time (CET)","Resolved At (CET)","Closed At (CET)","Short Description","IRIS Code","Current Assignment Group","Priority","Status","Created By","Created By Tool"]

chart.title: The Count Of Change Requests By Status Per Month

search.query:
| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_chg$" AND priority="$chg_priority$"
| eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
| eval late=case(like(late,"%now%"),now(),true(),relative_time(now(), late)) , earl=relative_time(now(),earl) | where time<=late AND time>=earl
| convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" mktime(sys_created_on) as _time | timechart cont=false span=$1month$ count(number) as count_number by status useother=f limit=0 | addtotals

| append[| makeresults | eval priority="1;2;3;4;5" | fields - _time | mvexpand priority | makemv priority delim=";" | mvexpand priority] | stats count by priority | eval count=count-1 | addtotals col=t labelfield=priority fieldname=count | eval color=case(priority="1" , "#DC4E41" , priority="2" , "#FCCE54" , priority="3" ,"#A267D8" , priority="4" ,"#ACA49E" , priority="5" ,"#6C757D", priority="Total","#87C1FF", true(),false ), priority=case(priority="1" , "P 1" , priority="2" , "P 2" , priority="3" ,"P 3" , priority="4" ,"P 4" , priority="5" ,"P 5", priority="Total","Total", true(), false )

| eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"

| search it_solution="$it_solution$" AND NEW_CI="$NEW_CI$" AND so="$so$" AND $status$ AND number="$text_token_prb$" AND priority="$prb_priority$"
| eval late="$tok_latest$" , earl="$tok_earliest$"
